CONCLUSION: Violation of Art. 6-1;Pecuniary damage - claim dismissed;Non-pecuniary damage - financial award;Costs and expenses partial award - Convention proceedings
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant is a NORP national who was born in DATE and lives in GPE , GPE .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant acquired the right to a long - term lease of a flat ( spółdzielcze lokatorskie prawo do lokalu ) in a building owned by ORG - operative ( PERSON ) .

CARDINAL . On DATE the co - operative sued the applicant in ORG ( Sąd Rejonowy ) , seeking payment . On DATE the court gave judgment and granted the claim . The applicant appealed against this judgment . On DATE ORG ( Sąd Wojewódzki ) amended the first - instance judgment .
CARDINAL . Subsequently , the applicant twice requested the Minister of ORG to grant her leave to file an extraordinary appeal with ORG ( Sąd Najwyższy ) . Her first request was rejected on DATE .
CARDINAL . NORP On DATE , upon the applicant ’s second request , the Minister of ORG filed a cassation appeal on the applicant ’s behalf , contesting the judgment of ORG of DATE .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG quashed both judgments given in the applicant ’s case and remitted the case to the court of first instance . It held that the lower courts had committed serious errors of fact and law .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG joined the applicant ’s case with similar proceedings against CARDINAL other members of the cooperative .

CARDINAL . On DATE the court exempted the applicant from CARDINAL of the court fees due . The applicant appealed . On DATE ORG rejected her appeal .

CARDINAL . On DATE the trial court ordered that further expert evidence be obtained . On DATE the expert submitted his report to the court . On DATE the applicant challenged the expert ’s opinion of CARDINAL DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE the court held a hearing and listed the next hearing for DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE the ORG gave judgment . On DATE the applicant appealed against this judgment .
CARDINAL . It appears that the proceedings are pending .
